mapper.select: select tpfr.id,tpfr.type,tpfr.serial_number,tpfr.name,tpfr.period,tpfr.charge_mode,tpfr.monetary_unit,tpfr.penal_sum,tpfr.penal_days,tpfr.status,tpfr.create_by,tpfr.update_by from t_property_fee_rule tpfr join t_community_property_fee_rule tcr on tpfr.id=tcr.rule_id join t_community tc on tc.id=tcr.community_id where tc.id=#{communityId}
